alert.note: Alert for Southern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 14 at 10:41PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN LEA...WEST CENTRAL ECTOR...SOUTHWESTERN ANDREWS...WINKLER AND EASTERN LOVING COUNTIES THROUGH 1230 AM CDT/1130 PM MDT/... At 1141 PM CDT/1041 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Jal, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Kermit, Jal, Wink, Jal Airport, Bennett, and Winkler County Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
